name: happycat
text: Philippe is guilt waiting to happen :(

name: cracklewater
text: Thuuugs!

name: griffypoo
text: Here comes a broken rib!

name: wolfslice
text:
I don't like this strip anymore.

I can understand Lyle doing this, but Teodor! It's almost unforgivable.

I wish Ray would bust in and straighten them out.

name: zefiel
text:
I wish that too, but Téodor is clearly ten kinds of wasted here. This is also happening before the New Year's Resolutions strip, where he decides to take Philippe under his wing. (I think it's in the paid archive)


/then again, the characters were basically beta this early on the strip and not yet that fleshed out.

name: cousinted
text: A comment left by cousinted was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, lux, clembot)

name: tessebatt
text: A comment left by tessebatt was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, MrMojoRisin, reburn)

name: lux
text: Yes?

name: lux
text: I'm dying of suspense! What is it?

name: woodenteeth
text: Are you dead of suspense yet? Oh... wait.

name: fineoakstructure
text: My guess is that tessebatt was wondering why NeoNaoNeo and Lux (and, eventually, clembot) lamed cousinted.

name: lux
text: I don't even remember laming this.. Reading over the comment, I don't know why I would have. o_O

name: rowboat
text: It is terrible, but it's REAL.  If you were young (unless you went to private school and/or had no close relatives of comparable age) you've been a part of this scenario, punching or punched.  Judging by the tone, I have to imagine Onstad was giving and not taking. There's too much guilt.

name: woodenteeth
text: Oh man, going to private school does not rule out getting punched in the guts. Some of the older kids in our school organised the "Corridor of Death". Big kids, lining both sides of a hallway and small, fast younger kids trying to run through without getting kicked, shoved and/or having their heads cracking on the cement floor (the sound of which is terribly fucked up).

name: rowboat
text: Yeah, I don't know why I added that. I never went to private school. I have no idea what goes on there.

name: woodenteeth
text: Religion goes on there... sometimes.

name: catachresis
text: This is the saddest thing.

name: twohundredninety
text: A comment left by twohundredninety was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, NeoNaoNeo, jollysaintpete)

name: waddlerz
text: Laming a great reply is the saddest thing

name: soticoto
text:
The second saddest thing.
You can't call it the saddest thing without discrediting and insulting the very reply you called great.

name: kazad
text: so sad...

name: overmedicated
text: ...awwwww...

name: gethen
text: A comment left by gethen was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Nurdbot, NeoNaoNeo, jollysaintpete, aquamuffin)

name: spectre
text: A comment left by spectre was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt, jollysaintpete, TranquilNight)

name: gethen
text: damnit, you're right, and you deserve every chubby you got.

name: nbgreene
text: we all do things that we regret.  i bet teodore sits awake at night and feels crappy about this.

name: flynn
text: Breaks my heart every time I see it. Why, Onstad? Why?

name: abe
text: This puts the tear in my beer every time.

name: mortshire
text: oh god, it's like something straight out of jimmy corrigan. *cries*

name: senatorexlax
text: Good golly is Jimmy Corrigan sad. It was one of those things where I read it in one sitting and just didn't want to talk to anybody the rest of the day.

name: professorhazard
text: That's how I felt about WE3.

name: cracklewater
text: I though WE3 had a lovely ending. The bulk of the story is nasty, but I had no idea it could end on a positive note.

name: tekende
text: I still have not read WE3 and don't ever plan to because the title is just about the dumbest fucking thing I've ever read.

name: rowboat
text: Take it from a non-comic nerd; it's actually pretty excellent. Not the title, but the story itself. It's worth it to look past it.

name: tekende
text:
How is the title pronounced? Is it, as I suspect, "We 3"? Or is it "W E 3"?

If it's the latter I might be able to move past the title.

name: rowboat
text: You'll have to ask a comic nerd. I assume it is the former, though.

name: cracklewater
text:
It's 'we three', as in 'the three of us'.

Excellent comic from beginning to end. I particularly loved Tinker the cat. She's probably a very accurate portrayal of what would happen if you gave a cat powered armour and weapons.

name: fermatprime
text:
It's the former, but it's kind of justified by the fact that that's how the animals talk, and it makes sense that that's how they talk. I thought it was a wonderful comic.

I think it's pretty terrible that they are going to make a movie out of it, though. Especially since it'll presumably be marketed as "CUTE ANIMALS STORY! FROM THE DIRECTOR OF KUNG FU PANDA!" And then a bunch of seven-year-olds will go see it and be fucking traumatized .

name: ambala
text: Sadder than a broken chicken egg.

name: nexus
text: Philippe should be the first Achewood guest artist.

name: m3funkyb
text: it's not like lyle hit him that hard, sometimes love is... tough

name: carlg
text: Philippe even seems to like it. His response is "oh boy." And then he says, "All I got you was . . ." I think the little guy is just happy to have received the attention of his super-friends.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: i think that because it was a gift and Philippe is a young man with Manners, he feels he should be thankful. All the confusion the boys have just instilled in Philippe's heart and squishy little head make it even crueller, and thus Kick Ass

name: a_dude
text: that was cruel as fuck.

name: sabacc
text: A comment left by sabacc was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MrMojoRisin, Vice, rhymesforkids, BillyLK, cailetshadow, whoppin, Wolfslice, Dallovich)

name: benet

name: gothfae
text: We haven't met Ray, Roast Beef or Pat yet.

name: amberjunk
text: Haha I came here to say that this strip is "the saddest thing" too.  Good job, all.

name: syrinx
text: Phillipe is such a beautiful tragedy.

name: huber
text: A comment left by huber was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Tinhand, ishuta, lamboyster, Nurdbot, tttt, NeoNaoNeo, Dallovich)

name: fallow_fields
text:
this strip shows the darker side of onstad's humour. While the subject matter is somewhat unfortunate (for philippe), he captures this moment perfectly.
Bonus points for character dev. on Teodor and Phillipe and yes, for being funny as hell

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, autrepoupee, sredni, Danjoebak)

name: shoinan
text:
You should've tried balancing it out a bit. For example:

I cried a bit at this. Then I ate a steak.

name: songbirdspectre
text: i cried a bit.

name: songbirdspectre
text: *rolls over and dies*

name: havenless
text: Lyle punched a 5 year old. What a BADASS.

name: professorhazard
text: Chubbied for avatar/text synergy

name: tekende
text: There is nothing tougher than hitting someone who can't possibly defend his or her self.

name: jugdish
text: too, too cute

name: cheeks_jd
text: A comment left by cheeks_jd was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dezufnocosem, joeynarcotic, lux, TTAGXAMM)

name: atticusonline
text: Phillipe has an amazing signature.

name: erinye
text: Seriously. A five-year-old with perfect cursive writing? Impressive.

name: atticusonline
text: I have been here forever.

name: tomsonlocal
text: Oh man, a 5 year old otter has better handwriting than me.

name: woodenteeth
text: Now all I can do is imagine Phillipe doing cursive in primary school, surrounded by other cute little otters gripping a pen awkwardly with a flipper, tongue poking out the side of his lips... and instead of desks all using their tummies in true Otter-stylee. Oh man... edwell, where are your photoshop skills when I need ya...

name: greymantledwolf
text: no one expects th' ol' punch in th' gut on xmas day ^5

name: robobogle
text: A comment left by robobogle was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, rowboat, gethen)

name: tpederson
text: I disagree with the unexpectedness of the Christmas punch.  At least for me, it was an off and on family tradition.  Never knew which year it was gonna be. I intend to pass that sentiment on to my kids.  It keeps you on your toes.  Also, tiger punching otters.. that's just the food chain in action, man... its natural.

name: gumfish
text: Aah, christmas.

name: honesttom
text: THIS is why Teodor couldn't get into heaven.

name: neitherman
text: I love how delightfully evil Teodor looks in this strip.  He's smiling like his cheeks are beginning to hurt due to all the holiday cheer he's ingested.

name: crinklebat
text: I'm glad other people find this strip pas unbearably harsh as I do. I always figured I just wasn't hard enough to deal with Philippe getting hit in the gut for Christmas.

name: joestork
text: Oh... oh god.  Oh, that's so upsetting.

name: jonnay
text: Lyle oughta not done that.  Phillippe was just a boy.  Mm-Hmm.

name: sagoon
text: i dunno what yall are talking about. child abuse is always funny.

name: gopacapulco
text: i just cried

name: drgetz
text: Hey thats just how you become a man, my brother would do much worst on holidays. And just look at me now...     *starts to cry*

name: zem
text: hahaha

name: nucleargeranium
text: So sad.

name: starch
text: this makes me want to cry

name: flandango
text: Lyle you dirty son of a bitch.

name: coco
text: Lie Bot, what is the saddest thing? This strip is the saddest thing.

name: snowman
text: 5'd for the almost unbearable sadness of this strip.

name: chachibenji
text: This strip makes me too sad.

name: pzukowski
text: Bullies rule!

name: edgy
text: Just looking at his handwriting, god I want to cry again. Philippe really deserves his huugs.

name: rbisme
text: Do you think child abuse is rad?

name: apricotta
text: I still can't get over it.

name: hamscout
text: Onstad has many of these strips, touting the dangers of alcohol, interpersonal relationships, and holidays...

name: benkastin
text: Cut the guys some slack, they're drunk for chrissakes

name: em2
text: God bless us all, everyone!

name: foetus_punch
text: The film "How to weep the weepy weep weep way" is just this comic, on-screen for 120 minutes. If you don't know how to cry by the end of it, you are a tear-ductless Klingon.

name: seph
text: Did anyone else notice Téodor doing a hell of good Sean Connery impression in the first frame?

name: efurman
text: Notice that Mr Bear is not involved in such low shenanigans.

name: joeynarcotic
text: It's true because it's funny. No, wait.

name: i_love_kate
text: This strip is possibly the definition of bittersweet. In certain modern dictionaries, the word itself follows its definition with a hyperlink to this strip.

name: arelladawn
text: It is becoming apparent at this point that without the dirtiest dudes in town this strip may have just basically fizzled out.  Don't be tryin' to play like you disagree!

name: kikineko
text: Oh dear, poor little Philippe... ;( I hope Teodore and Lyle's guilt are more painful than their punches to Philippe!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: This is the saddest thing.

name: wolfensti
text: Really , it is so !

name: zapatos
text:
hahahaha

what a good comic!

name: lolsworth
text: This is wrong.

name: freakscene
text:
I find this strip to be viscerally satisfying for reasons I cannot explain and indeed do not fully understand.

Here I stand; I can do no other. God help me. Amen.

name: philophobe
text:
I have a feeling that this strip might be an excellent one to use for screening new friends:

- If you show it to someone and they simply look at you as though you had just sneezed in their grandmother's ear, don't waste any more of your time.

- If you show it to someone and they just laugh and laugh and keep laughing, a diabolical glint in their eye which speaks of a dark past, you may want to excuse yourself to use the restroom but then duck out the window, being sure to slash their tires so as to forestall pursuit.

- If, on the other hand, you show it to someone and they chortle heartily but immediately feel completely terrible about it , well sir, say hello to your Super-Friend!

If you show it someone and they

name: philophobe
text:
...the fuck is my problem?

SHIT

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i think you are my new Assetbar friend.

name: philophobe
text: Man, if I knew I could make friends just by totally fucking up, I'd be, like, a guy with millions of friends by now.

name: mashisoyo
text: You totally fucked up? Maybe ju an' me are amigos!

name: carlyle
text: Hee!

name: all-star951
text: Haa!

name: mashisoyo
text: Hoo!

name: tollschaft
text: It just isn't the same without Ray and Roast Beef :(

name: spaceandrew
text: My eyes have tears in them now.
